result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.SlimGuides.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim

classpath: fitnesse.jar
classpath: fitlibrary.jar
classpath: ./lib/*.jar

import
fitnesse.slim.test
fitnesse.fixtures
com.magneticreason.fitnium

scenario jump to test page
the server is located at localhost
the server is on port 4444
using the browser start at; *chrome , localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test
starting at URL testpage4api.html
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
check title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page
check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true

Browser Control APIs


Your first command is normally to tell fitnium which browser to start testing in and which URL to start from
| Using the browser | browser | start at | URL |

Short cut versions of the above command
| using firefox start at | URL |
| using explorer start at | URL |
| using explorer in HTA mode start at | URL |
| using chrome start at | URL |

Commands to Control the browser
| close the browser |
| click the back button |
| click the refresh button |
| click the close button |

And finally how to set the Debugging level in Selenium
| set browser log level  | < debug | info | warn | error | off> |

Examples


Exceptions
